data.trans_hint: Có rất nhiều muỗi trong những ngày mưa.
data.en_hint: There are a lot of mosquitoes on rainy days.
data.content_game_1: There are a lot of mosquitoes on rainy days.
data.answer_en_hint: There are a lot of mosquitoes on rainy days.

data.trans_hint: Ruồi là một trong những loài côn trùng có hại.
data.en_hint: Fly is one of the harmful insects.
data.content_game_1: fly is one of the harmful insects.
data.answer_en_hint: fly is one of the harmful insects.

data.trans_hint: Người ta nói rằng khi chuồn chuồn bay thấp nghĩa là trời sắp mưa.
data.en_hint: People say that when the dragonfly flies low from the ground, it is going to rain.

data.answer_en_hint: People say that when the dragonfly flies low from the ground, it is going to rain.

data.trans_hint: Cách mà kiến xây tổ thật đáng kinh ngạc.
data.en_hint: The way the ants build their nest is amazing.

data.answer_en_hint: The way the ants build their nest is amazing.

data.trans_hint: Gián thường sống ở những góc ẩm thấp bẩn thỉu.
data.en_hint: Cockroach usually lives in wet dirty corners.
data.content_game_1: cockroach usually lives in wet dirty corners.
data.answer_en_hint: cockroach usually lives in wet dirty corners.

data.trans_hint: Sẽ rất đau nếu bạn bị một con ong đốt.
data.en_hint: It is very painful if you are stung by a bee.
data.content_game_1: It is very painful if you are stung by a bee.
data.answer_en_hint: It is very painful if you are stung by a bee.

data.trans_hint: Vào đêm hè, những chú dế kêu tạo nên bài hát với âm thanh tuyệt vời.
data.en_hint: In the summer night, crickets create a song with beautiful sound.
data.content_game_1: In the summer night, crickets create a song with beautiful sound.
data.answer_en_hint: In the summer night, crickets create a song with beautiful sound.

data.trans_hint: Đôi cánh sặc sỡ của loài bướm thực sự rất ấn tượng.
data.en_hint: The colorful wings of the butterfly are impressive.
data.content_game_1: The colorful wings of the butterfly are impressive.
data.answer_en_hint: The colorful wings of the butterfly are impressive.

data.trans_hint: Bạn có thể chết nếu bị một con bọ cạp cắn.
data.en_hint: You could be killed by a scorpion if it stings you.
data.content_game_1: You could be killed by a scorpion if it stings you.
data.answer_en_hint: You could be killed by a scorpion if it stings you.

data.trans_hint: Con nhện xe mạng nhện bằng tơ của nó.
data.en_hint: The spider creates cobwebs with its silk.
